archimate:Principle.name: DP02- Pursuit Quality by Design
archimate:Principle.documentation:
The objective of this design principle is to offer guidelines and mechanisms and share best practices for producing high-quality data sets, services, and metadata that are easy to use, discover, and trust
Core Concepts; Accuracy, Consistency, Completeness, Richness, Reliability.
Best practices of quality include ensuring quality is a consideration from the design phase onward, using methodologies like DevOps [18] and DataOps [19] to maintain it throughout the data lifecycle, following established standards, and adjusting quality levels based on the particular requirements of each use case.
